Html:
i imported a certificate from our internal CA (Windows Server 2012R2) to WPP.
Than i resign the 7Zip package successfully. After that i can installed the package on a server.

Than i will resign Adobe Acrobat Reader, but i get follow error:
Resign a package failed with this error: Failed to sign package, error was 2148081670.


Regards,
Daniel

This sound bad.
"Failed to sign package, error was 2148081670" is an error from Wsus itself. Looks like your Wsus server doesn't like your cert.

How do you have done to import the cert into the "Wsus" store ?

Good morning,
i have deleted all certificates in the wsus folder and installed it again. After a reboot it work's again. Strange...
